name: Samo
description: Pours pale gold with subtle bread aromas, balanced by floral and spicy notes and a touch of lemon zest.

name: Rein
description: Refreshing smooth malt backbone with fruit notes and floral aroma.

name: Vindobona
description: Hints of caramel and biscuit, balanced by mild earthy hops, a crisp medium-light body, and a clean, dry finish.

name: Summer Lupula
description: Summer variant of Lupula, lower alcohol, more citrus-forward. Pineapple and mango.

name: Daltonico
description: Slightly roasty body, with notes of subtle pine, citrus, with chocolate undertones.
hops: Cascade CGX™, Erebus™, Idaho 7™, Nelson Sauvin™

name: Taupō
description: Tropical passion fruit, red grapefruit, and zested orange.

name: Wairua
description: Collaboration with our friends at Swiftwater Brewing. Pineapple, juicy citrus, mango, and stone fruit.

name: Rubico
description: Pineapple, peach rings, bubblegum, strawberry and citrus.

name: Double Prismatic
description: Tangerine zest, pineapple, raspberry, and lemongrass.
